title: 10/11: Start or Sit (AFC), Rest of Season Outlooks (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Today on the show, find out why Dave and Heath don't agree on Andrew Luck's Week 6 outlook, if Big Ben can thrive on the road, which underowned WRs can help you out and much more. But first, let's read some of your emails (2:30) and talk about D'Onta Foreman, the PIT backfield, the weather in Denver and other Fantasy topics ... Why you may be overlooking the IND WRs (10:30), NFL news items to know (15:00), rest of season analysis (21:00) on key players like Phillip Lindsay and Amari Cooper ... IND-NYJ (28:22), KC-NE (36:50), CHI-MIA (43:41), PIT-CIN (49:50), BUF-HOU (53:15), LAC-CLE (57:00), LAR-DEN (1:02:00), BAL-TEN (1:04:30) ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
